description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding for use as gym and other uses
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings / document title number(s): 2022/96/HRG/101- EXISTING AND PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLANS AND BLOCK PLANS ; 2022/96/HRG/102 : 2022/96/HRG/104/A : EXISTING FLOOR PLAN, BLOCK PLAN & ELEVATION OF OUTBUILDING ; 2022/96/HRG/105/A1 : PROPOSED FLOOR PLAN, BLOCK PLAN & ELEVATION OF OUTBUILDING ;
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be in accordance with those described on the hereby approved plans listed in Condition 2 and the submitted Application Form.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with 	policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D4 and D5 of the 	London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The outbuilding hereby approved shall be used for domestic purposes ancillary to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse at 96 Hurley Road, Greenford, Middlesex, UB6 9HB and not for any separate residential, industrial, commercial or business use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed into the outbuilding at any time.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D14 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
